title: Zombie Tales Vol. 3: Good Eatin'
description: Volume 3 of the critically acclaimed zombie anthology that rides the wave of new school zombie horror, ala 28 DAYS LATER, SHAWN OF THE DEAD and DAWN OF THE DEAD remake.We've got plenty more mad creations spilling out of our zombie kitchen! Delivering smart, accessible, high-quality short stories, this anthology has met with great acclaim amongst both comic and zombie fans. Featuring more great zombie stories from more great writers and artists that you know and love. Don't worry about leaving room for dessert-you're it!
author: William Messner-Loebs
